name: Signed, Barold
description:
Signed, Barold

As the Mayor, you're faced with a decision that could forever change the future of lovely Bear Shire, and perhaps even the integrity of your wilderness-integrated home.

Who will you side with? 

The large corporation, Selkirk Sustainable, or the infamous Bearbino Clan?

Choose your words carefully!

Credits

Alex Blaskovich----Background Art
Adrienne Co--------Programming and Design
Rachel Kudlacz---- Bear Design and Animation
Jeff Liao-------------Dialogue
Ethan Yamashita-- Dialogue and Music
Rina Yu--------------Dialogue
